DOC.brief_summary: Rigorous clinical practice assessment key factor improve patient 's care prognosis interventional cardiology ( IC ) . A multicentric IC observational study ( CRAC ) , fully integrate usual coronary activity report software , start Centre Val de Loire ( CVL ) region 2014 . CRAC observatory conduce five IC CathLab CVL region . Quality collect data regularly evaluate allowed building exhaustive , reliable database . This solution could easily develop French region .
